item.title: Farmers’ Food at the doorstep
item.author: Amarandaas Kaluvan,
item.description: You might have seen the signs around campus already – there is a new farmers market on Queens Lawn every Tuesday. You will be surprised by how much fresh vegetables and fruits this is. Apart from the expected English strawberries, raspberries, blueberries, plums, apples and pears, there are also …
